title: Big Plays Spotlight: Jinx evens the odds

replies.body:
I guess you could say that clip...
*belongs in a museum*
ADC'S are so Gnarcissistic:)
That pun gave me cancer
Well we know who doesn't *need a map *
Actually this video looks pretty new.
Its an Ezreal quote...
Well, it's an Indiana Jones quote that Riot used for Ezreal, but your statement works too.
Which movie was that exact quote from? Google was not my friend for that one...
I'm pretty sure (but not 100% positive) that it's from *The Last Crusade*.
If I ever hear that WRETCHED ANNOYING TAUNT AGAIN I'LL belong in a museum. Hm. Guess I should have thought that out better.
And then it turned into an 8v2 because everyone else realized the ADCs were just too dang good. The end.
What flavor does my virus come in this time?
Mine tasted purple! {{champion:117}}
{{champion:81}}  That joke belongs in a museum!
{{champion:81}} You belong in a museum!
{{champion:81}}  Need a map to the museum?
{{champion:33}} Ok.
{{champion:64}} I didn't see that coming.
{{champion:254}} are you doing this?
'Cause it's {{champion:254}} -vacious
{{champion:99}} These puns make everything seem brighter.
{{champion:56}} Not for long...

> {{champion:236}} very, wifesteal op

***Bikesteal***
{{champion:236}} very, wifesteal op
{{champion:1}}  Annie-one who read that might've gotten mad.
{{champion:412}} angry? quite likely?
{{champion:37}} ....
Global skillshots are one of the most satisfying things to succeed at in LoL.
This clip is one of those moments that ADs with long-range executes dream about...

You have to get really lucky, but knowing exactly where their adc/jungler/etc. is after a major teamfight is always satisfying.

YES YES FARM THOSE WRAITHS, MWAHAHAHA{{champion:81}}

can you imagine, jinx singing 

"anything you can do i can do better"

BOOM

I guess that play was...
Ezreal as it gets


I'm so sorry
{{champion:30}}  : What only 2 in a global ult?
his isn't a global ult. it's a hit everyone ult. it requires no aiming.
He hit's every enemy with a global range, meaning it's range is limited to the map.
you can literaly hear all the players write in the chat at the end of the play lol
Usual Korean bronze V plays.

I guess the purple team was "Miss-led" by the situation. :D 
{{champion:222}}{{champion:117}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:31}}
7of those champions are not purple.
But all of the ones that aren't originally purple have purple skins, so technically you're both wrong
The champs i put there are there cuz they smiling at my pun :p
I wouldn't say Kha'Zix is smiling lol...

The video links to wombo combo, fix it quick!

Also, props to the snipers in bot-lane o_O

I really like the non-English voices, not particularly because they're "better", but just because I'm so used to the current ones by now that they're refreshing to hear.(I wish there was a way to have them on NA for a bit, just to see how they are, it'd be interesting)
there is a way. just google it. it involves some simple changes and redownloads, but it does work. And yes its soooooo refreshing hearing new voices.

Ezreal grabs a double kill for his team.
How does Jinx reply?
ANOTHER DOUBLE KILL.
I love how the Elise at top is just like "BYEEEEE" and leaves.
The Classic, "Not impressed, I can do that too!" come back.
Jinx thought it was to EZ{{champion:222}}
